mapper.select: SELECT recordId_n AS recordId, categoryId_n AS categoryId, type_x AS type, late_c AS late, count_n AS count, weight_n AS weight, price_n AS price, amount_n AS amount, desc_x AS description, record_dt AS recordDate, active_c AS active, crtBy_m AS createBy, crtOn_dt AS createDate FROM cf_record WHERE type_x = #{type} AND active_c = 'A' ORDER BY record_dt DESC, crtOn_dt DESC
